scenario.name: 05-C Call Park - Metaswitch CFS SIPREC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:7603213214@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Call-ID: [call_id] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]sipptag00[call_number] To: <sip:7603213214@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> CSeq: 299762889 INVITE Expires: 180 Organization: Metaswitch Networks Supported: resource-priority, siprec, 100rel Content-Length: [len] Require: siprec Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, REGISTER, OPTIONS, PRACK, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, INFO, PUBLISH Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;+sip.src P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=metaswitch-boundary
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 3453553686 3453553686 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 101 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=ptime:20 a=label:1
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Disposition: recording-session Content-Type: application/rs-metadata
